name: hazelcast-client
description: Hazelcast - open source In-Memory Data Grid - client for NodeJS

scripts.coverage: rimraf coverage && istanbul cover -x **/codec/**/* --root lib/ --include-all-sources _mocha -- --recursive --reporter spec
scripts.coverage-all: rimraf coverage && istanbul cover --root lib/ --include-all-sources _mocha -- --recursive --reporter spec
scripts.postcoverage: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/cobertura-coverage.xml -t cobertura && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage -t html
scripts.generate-docs: rimraf docs && typedoc --out docs/ --exclude **/codec/**/* --module commonjs src lib.es6.d.ts typings/index.d.ts --excludeExternals
